segments.text: I catch myself holding my breath as the boy precariously reaches for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he balances makes me anxious just watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waiting below him, arm raised, adds to the tension in the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the gorgeous garden outside and wish for that calmness to penetrate this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Each drip of water from the sink seems to echo the impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s surprising how unaware the adult is of the brewing trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how quickly joy can turn into disaster in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
